title: ONGC appoints Pomila Jaspal as the Director (Finance) and CFO - Economic Times
content: ONGC appoints Pomila Jaspal as the Director (Finance) and CFO  Economic Times
description: Government-owned oil and gas explorer and producer Oil and Natural Gas Corporation (ONGC) has appointed Pomila Jaspal as the Director (Finance) and Chief Financial Officer with immediate effect, the company informed the exchanges on Tuesday.
